nodes.text: The Andoan Wars were a series of wars around the planet Ando, fought primarily between the Spiverelda, the government of the Lambda sector, and the Andoan Free Colonies. The ruling nests, which governed the Harch species, sided with the Spiverelda. The Galactic Republic later sided with the Andoan Free Colonies, which contributed to the Free Colonies being spared.
The Harch felt insulted by the Republic's interference, which ultimately led to their siding with the Confederacy of Independent Systems during the Clone Wars, twenty years later.
